所有程序包的分层结构

程序包分层结构:
  • classifier,
  • cmd,
  • core,
  • gui,
  • kernel,
  • libsvm,
  • mat,
  • opt,
  • preprocess,
  • reduction,
  • text,
  • utility

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmd.BatchLearn
    • opt.Cache
    • java.awt.Component (implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable)
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
          • java.awt.Frame (implements java.awt.MenuContainer)
            • javax.swing.JFrame (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants)
              • gui.ApplicationFrame (implements java.io.Externalizable)
    • core.DataSet (implements java.io.Externalizable)
    • utility.DataUtility
    • core.Evaluation
    • text.FeatureFilter
    • cmd.General
    • core.InFile
    • kernel.Kernel (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • kernel.GaussianKernel
      • kernel.PolynomialKernel
    • core.KFold
    • core.Machine (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • classifier.AdaBoostDMH (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • classifier.AdaBoostRMH (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • classifier.FSCLCluster
      • classifier.KmeansCluster (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • classifier.KNN (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • reduction.KPCA (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • reduction.LDA (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • classifier.LibSVM
      • classifier.MCE (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • preprocess.MeanMissing
      • preprocess.MeanNorm
      • classifier.MLP (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • classifier.MultiStump (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • classifier.NaiveBayes (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • reduction.PCA
      • preprocess.Scale
      • classifier.SVM
      • text.TFIDF (implements java.io.Externalizable)
      • preprocess.Threasholdable
      • reduction.Whiten
    • core.MachinePipe (implements java.io.Externalizable)
    • mat.Mat
    • core.OutFile
    • core.Pair<A,B> (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • opt.QPSMO
    • cmd.RunMode
    • cmd.StartMain
    • libsvm.svm
    • libsvm.svm_model (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • libsvm.svm_node (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • libsvm.svm_parameter (implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable)
    • libsvm.svm_problem (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • libsvm.svm.decision_function
    • utility.TestCase
    • text.TextReader
    • core.Utility
    • core.Utility.IntValue (implements java.lang.Comparable<T>)
    • core.Utility.StringValue (implements java.lang.Comparable<T>)
    • mat.Vec

接口分层结构

  • libsvm.svm_print_interface

枚举分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<E> (implements java.lang.Comparable<T>, java.io.Serializable)
      • gui.ApplicationFrame.OpenFilter
      • cmd.RunMode.MachineType
      • core.DataSet.LabelFormat
